short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Keeps the original Chrome new tab functionality and adds a To-Do List.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
"Stay organized and productive with this To-Do List extension!

This extension transforms your Chrome new tab page into a minimalist and user-friendly task management tool. Add, edit, and organize your daily tasks directly from the new tab. Features include:

Task creation and editing: Add new tasks or modify existing ones with ease.
Completion tracking: Check off completed tasks, which automatically move to the bottom.
Auto-cleanup: Completed tasks are automatically cleared at midnight, helping you start fresh each day.
Customization: Personalize your experience by changing the background with a simple click.
Lightweight design: Clean and simple interface for distraction-free productivity.
This extension is perfect for anyone who wants to stay focused, prioritize tasks, and maximize productivity throughout the day.

Install now and make every new tab count!"
